instructions:
Character Sheet Chaosium's Heroquest Glorantha
If you wish to use the runes you will need to install the Glorantha Rune font from here https://wellofdaliath.chaosium.com/home/gloranthan-documents/glorantha-2/glorantha-core-rune-font/. The browser will also have to set to Allow unsfafe scripts for the page.To remove the fonts click the settings cog and deselect the checkbox
